title: Christian Media Company logo design------Need a little help deciding and suggestions would help
content:
Ive worked on several ideas for this company and wound up trying to decide between these two logos:

Logo1 —-

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090802143552im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LogoIdea1_3445.jpg)

logo2 —-

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090802143552im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LogoIdea2_5001.jpg)
  
Can anyone enlighten me in some way and help me decide or if you have any suggestion please let me know...
author: loogy

comments.content: Can give us a bit more detail regarding what services they provide?

I thought that logo2 reminded me of something:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090802143552im_/http:/typophile.com/files/oce_6007.png)
  
But then, everything reminds me of something else :)
Move this stuff to the crit forums. And Francis please read the rules before you post.
